page.title: 13Shopping in Ropley
page.content: My Mum uses our village shop,Pondside Stores,to collect the milk in the morning because we do not have our milk delivered and we also get the daily newspaper from there.Mum doesn't drive so it is easy for her to walk up to Pondside for things she forgets at the big supermarket in Alton where she shops once a week.Dad comes home early from work on Thursday or Friday and we all (Mum,Dad,me and my two older brothers)go by car to do our shopping at Gateway in Alton.Pondside Stores is handy on a Sunday morning as it is open then when all the big shops are closed.Mum says it also has more time to help and serve you if you need something special and also the shopkeeper has time to stop and talk to you and you meet other people from the village there.
